title: Advanced Mathematics Concept Learning Course Using Infographics

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Basic Mathematical Concepts (e.g., Equations, Functions, Statistics)
context.additional_context: Training for in-service professionals to address data visualization needs encountered in workplace tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent mathematical concepts using infographic creation tools.
Learners can transform complex mathematical data into infographics of three or more types.
Learners can utilize infographics created in mobile environments for peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
